comment: /** * Create and return a new {@link DNASequence} with quality scores from the specified * FASTQ formatted sequence. The quality scores are stored in a {@link QualityFeature} * with a type "qualityScores" the same length as the sequence. * * @param fastq FASTQ formatted sequence, must not be null * @return a new {@link DNASequence} with quality scores from the specified FASTQ formatted sequence * @throws CompoundNotFoundException if DNA sequence in fastq contains unrecognised compounds */
